name: dozzle
description: Dozzle is a lightweight, real-time log viewer for Docker containers. It runs as a container and provides a web UI to browse and filter logs across containers, making it easy to debug and monitor running services.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific log entries using text search and filter by container, time range, or log

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Follow logs in real-time similar to docker logs -f without command-line access

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Run as a single lightweight container without databases or complex configuration requirements

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Protect log access with basic auth or proxy authentication for secure multi-user environments
